text:
Stylish shopping center located in the heart of Orchard Road, Singapore. The mall offers a unique blend of high-end fashion, luxury lifestyle, and artisanal boutiques.

The interior design is sleek and modern, with plenty of natural light pouring in through the glass ceiling. I enjoyed browsing through the various stores, which ranged from international designer brands to local specialty shops.

One of the standout features of Mandarin Gallery is its dining options. The mall boasts a range of upscale restaurants and cafes, serving everything from fine dining to casual bites.

We are incredibly proud to be one of the longest-tenured tenants at Mandarin Gallery since 2009. From our humble beginnings as a tiny boutique on Level Four, where a world of shopping, retail, services, and F&B offerings unfolds across four levels, we have blossomed. For the 16th consecutive year, we've expanded to three units on Level Four. We warmly invite you to experience the joy of lifestyle and furniture shopping with our exclusive brands from Japan, featuring many Japan Made Items.
Biggest breakfast buffet I've gone to. Eggs made to order, asian station, indian station and juice bar were my favorites.

This mall is attached to Mandarin Orchard hotel and has a lot of high end retail outlets as well as a myriad of restaurants ranging from affordable brunch places to pricy wagyu omakase.
